Customer Data will be used by Stormboard in accordance with the Customer's instructions, including any applicable terms in the Terms of Use, Customer Terms of Service and Customer's use of Services, and as required by applicable law.

Stormboard will retain Customer Data in accordance with a Customer's instructions, including any applicable terms in the Customer Agreement and Customer's use of Services functionality, and as required by applicable law.
Stormboard will use and process the Customer Data to provide the Services.

Stormboard may receive data about organizations, industries, website visitors, marketing campaigns and other matters related to our business from parent corporations, affiliates and subsidiaries, our partners, or others that we use to make our own information better or more useful.
For example, we ask visitors who sign up for our Services to provide a name, username, company name, photo and email address.
These cookies may be set by us (first-party) or by third-party services.
If you believe that we have breached a relevant data protection law and wish to make a complaint, please contact us at security@stormboard.com and provide us with full details of the alleged breach.
We collect and process information about you only where we have legal basis for doing so.
Stormboard may retain Other Information pertaining to you for as long as necessary for the purposes described in this Privacy Policy.
For example, we ask visitors who sign up for our Services to provide a name, username, company name, photo and email address.
